title: Lil Duval and The Real Sidechicks of Charlotte Interview and More
itunes:title: Lil Duval and The Real Sidechicks of Charlotte Interview and More
description:
Friday 7/28 - Today on the show we had comedian Lil Duval come by to promote his stand up show this weekend, lets just say he let loose on the jokes. In fact we made him stay longer to help us interview the Real Side Chicks of Charlotte ( Yes, this is a real thing), and lets just say none of those women were safe during that interview. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a white woman that made a false report about how she was abducted and gang raped.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Friday 7/28 - Today on the show we had comedian Lil Duval come by to promote his stand up show this weekend, lets just say he let loose on the jokes. In fact we made him stay longer to help us interview the Real Side Chicks of Charlotte ( Yes, this is a real thing), and lets just say none of those women were safe during that interview. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a white woman that made a false report about how she was abducted and gang raped.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
